name: Co teu primeiro ... / Avec ton premier...
name_original: Co teu primeiro ... / Avec ton premier...
description:
This little piece of game was created for the Bitsy-Haiku Jam. A Haiku is a very short poem (3 verses of 5/7/5 syllabes) in which the autor express a lyric concret feeling, usually connected in someway with the nature.

The game is 30 seconds long with only one scenario for the gamejam. I included a fragment of music and some effects to accompany with the feeling at the haiku. The haiku was separated in three dialogue boxes in Galician (original) and French (translated) maintaining the syllabic structure in each language.

CREDITS

Haiku author and developement of the game: Miguel Valverde

Music: Fragment of "Beauty" (Spectacular Sound Productions https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Spectacular_Sound_Productions/ CC BY-SA 4.0 https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/).

Sound effect: A fragment of Zapsplat sound effect titled "Small ocean waves breaking on tropical sandy bay, Great Keppel Island, Great Barrier Reef, Australia"
